name: Game A Week - Week 5
description:
When it comes to Hardware the last thing you would think is "Car". In shift you control the car and all its controls, additionally you can also take the new car to the Mod Shop and change a few parts for some sporty upgrades, the world is your oyster; all you have to do is Shift.

Controls:
  • W:- Walk forward / Accelerate
  • A:- Strafe left / Turn Left
  • S:- Walk backward / Brake
  • D:- Strafe right / Turn Right
  • E:- Enter Car / Shift Down
  • Q:- Shift Up
  • Space:- Handbrake
  • H:- Toggle Headlights
  • F:- Interact with the Mod Shop
  • Esc:- Pause
Assets Used:
  • Character Model by Adobe on Mixamo
  • Character Animation by Adobe on Mixamo
  • Car Models by Bear Interactive on Unity Asset Store
